Articles.Content:
I cannot load a quicksave, whether it be an F9 quickload or a ''esc menu -> load game'' quickload. I can quicksave perfectly fine, but when I press and hold F9, the green message appears but the game just doesn't load from my last save. It pauses for about 0.1 seconds but the game carries on. I tried remapping the buttons, but it did not fix the issue. I reinstalled the game, and quickloading worked..... for about 10 minutes as I took a break and when I came back it refused to quickload again. I cannot test or properly complete any crafts/missions and it's becoming really annoying.

 

This issue only ever started once I installed KSP 1.8, and I didn't have this issue in any other versions.
Your question has been moved to the support subforum. Good luck with your issue.

On 12/30/2019 at 8:54 AM, WarpSpeed127 said:

I cannot load a quicksave, whether it be an F9 quickload or a ''esc menu -> load game'' quickload. I can quicksave perfectly fine, but when I press and hold F9, the green message appears but the game just doesn't load from my last save. It pauses for about 0.1 seconds but the game carries on. I tried remapping the buttons, but it did not fix the issue. I reinstalled the game, and quickloading worked..... for about 10 minutes as I took a break and when I came back it refused to quickload again. I cannot test or properly complete any crafts/missions and it's becoming really annoying.

 

This issue only ever started once I installed KSP 1.8, and I didn't have this issue in any other versions. 

 

Maybe try looking at the log, usually it makes a note when you quicksave. The log should say, Game saved to saves/(save name)/quicksave.

Edited December 31, 2019 by DunaManiac

[Removed]

Edited February 11, 2023 by WarpSpeed127

1 hour ago, WarpSpeed127 said:

What log? If it's a file, where is it located?

Follow the link in my signature.

Offhand, do you have free space on the disk?

[Removed]

Edited February 11, 2023 by WarpSpeed127

1 hour ago, WarpSpeed127 said:

Yes I have space, but not much as I play on laptop and I can't afford a proper PC right now

We need log files:

Read this BEFORE asking for support: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83212-how-to-get-support-read-first/

5 hours ago, WarpSpeed127 said:

What log? If it's a file, where is it located?

The ksp log is a file, you can find it in the main ksp directory. You can also check the log in-game using the ALT-F12 menu and switching to the debugging tab.
